member.name: T:ConsoleApp1.Plane
member.summary: This class allows the creation of a plane object, which has the ability to do basic vertical movements, turn and consume fuel

member.name: P:ConsoleApp1.Plane.Height
member.summary: Gets the height of the plane Height of the planePoints to _height

member.name: P:ConsoleApp1.Plane.Speed
member.summary: Gets the speed of the plane Speed of the planePoints to _speed

member.name: P:ConsoleApp1.Plane.Orientation
member.summary: Gets the orientation of the plane in grades Height of the planePoints to _orientation

member.name: P:ConsoleApp1.Plane.Fuel
member.summary: Gets the fuel of the plane Fuel of the planePoints to _fuel

member.name: M:ConsoleApp1.Plane.Turn(System.Double)
member.summary: It allows the plane to turn horizontally.

member.name: M:ConsoleApp1.Plane.Ascend(System.Double)
member.summary: It allows the plane to ascend.

member.name: M:ConsoleApp1.Plane.Descend(System.Double)
member.summary: It allows the plane to descend.

member.name: M:ConsoleApp1.Plane.ConsumeFuel(System.Double)
member.summary: It allows the plane to consume fuel. It can be negative, so you can also use it to add fuel.
